maxlength="60" /></div><div class="form-type-password form-item-pass form-item form-group" data-toggle="tooltip" title="Wprowadź swoje hasło."> <label for="edit-pass">Hasło <span class="form-required" title="To pole jest wymagane.">*</span></label><span class="label-description" tabindex="-1"><a href="/user/password">Zapomniałeś hasła?</a></span> <input class="form-control form-text required" tabindex="2" type="password" id="edit-pass" name="pass" size="60" maxlength="128" /></div><input type="hidden" name="form_build_id" value="form-vn-onV7Oxd-mfci40fXS2U9SyHER_dUufzlcX0WOFaM" /><input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="user_login" /><button tabindex="3" class="btn btn-default form-submit" id="edit-submit" name="op" value="Zaloguj" type="submit">Zaloguj</button></div></form></div><div class="dropdown-register-form"><p>Nie masz jeszcze konta?</p><a href="/user/register" class="btn btn-default form-submit">Zarejestruj się</a></div><div class="dropdown-facebook-connect"><p><a href="/user/simple-fb-connect"><span class="icon icomoon icon-facebook facebook-connect-icon" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="facebook-connect-description">Połącz z Facebook</span></a></p></div></div></li></ul> </nav></div></div><div id="menu-more-dropdown" class="collapse"><div class="container"><ul class="menu nav navbar-nav secondary"><li class="first leaf"><a href="/jak_analizowac_wykresy_gieldowe">Darmowy e-book</a></li><li class="leaf"><a href="/blog">Blog inwestorski</a></li><li class="leaf"><a href="/pomoc">Pomoc</a></li></ul></div></div><div id="compact-quotations-container" class="container-fixed collapse in hidden-lg"><div class="container"><div class="region id="main-content"></a><h1 class="page-header">Monnari Trade SA - Wskaźniki finansowe</h1><h2 class="element-invisible">Karty podstawowe</h2><ul class="tabs--primary nav nav-tabs"><li class=""><a </div></section> <section id="block-views-nadchodz-ce-czaty-block" class="block block-views clearfix"><h2 class="block-title">Nadchodzące wydarzenia</h2><div class="view view-nadchodz-ce-czaty view-id-nadchodz_ce_czaty view-display-id-block view-dom-id-7e458c8f76eb88fb1f831255daf1f28e"><div class="view-content"><div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last"><div class="views-field views-field-title"> <span class="field-content"><a href="/artykuly/czaty-inwestorskie/20230330/wyniki-finansowe-2022-pcc-exol"><span class="icon icomoon icon-new-comments" aria-hidden="true"></span> Czat inwestorski z wiceprezesem zarządu PCC Exol</a></span></div><div class="views-field views-field-field-data-czatu"><div class="field-content info"><span class="icon icomoon icon-clock" aria-hidden="true"></span><span class="date-display-single" property="dc:date" datatype="xsd:dateTime" content="2023-04-04T12:00:00+02:00">wtorek, 4 Kwiecień, 2023 - 12:00</span></div></div></div></div></div></section> <section id="block-tagclouds-6" class="block block-tagclouds block-block clearfix"><h2 class="block-title"><a href="/hashtagi">Najpopularniejsze z 14 dni <span class="icon icomoon icon-chevron-right pull-right"></span></a></h2> <span class='tagclouds-term'><a href="/hashtag/wig" class="tagclouds level1" title="">#wig</a></span><span class='tagclouds-term'><a href="/hashtag/usdpln" class="tagclouds level1" title="">#usdpln</a></span><span class='tagclouds-term'><a href="/hashtag/wigbanki" class="tagclouds level1" title="">#wigbanki</a></span><span class='tagclouds-term'><a href="/hashtag/swig80" class="tagclouds level1" title="">#swig80</a></span><span class='tagclouds-term'><a
